this_title: Women Don't Fall from the Sky
introduction: Set in the San Gabriel Valley, WOMEN DON'T FALL FROM THE SKY, examines intertwining lives and relationships between Chinese immigrants and Chinese-Americans. At the center of the story is five-year old, Katie, whose parents are in the midst of a divorce. Her new neighbor, Simon Lee, a successful chiropractor develops a friendship with her mother, Lily. With good intentions of bringing her estranged parents back together, Katie accidentally causes chaos between Simon and her father, Joe Huang.
chinese_title: Women Don't Fall from the Sky
